sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { logos, socialMediaUrl } from "../Details"; function Header() { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const { linkdein, github, email } = socialMediaUrl; const toggleClass = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); }; return (
  • Home
  • About
  • Publications
  • Projects
  • Contact
); } export default Header;
